text: I am trying to install pysqlite (Python interface to the SQLite).
I downloaded the file with the package (pysqlite-2.5.5.tar.gz).

code:
gunzip pysqlite-2.5.5.tar.gz
tar xvf pysqlite-2.5.5.tar
\cd pysqlite-2.5.5
python setup.py install

text: At the last step I have a problem.
I get the following error message:

code: error: command 'gcc' failed with exit status 1

text: I found that other peoples also had this problem.
